web sheriff: The Web Sheriff has industry experience in relevant technologies the team uses. He offers guidance in the form of mentorship and project direction.

Computer scientist: The Computer scientist has computer science experience (degree or self-taught). He is able to offer recommendations about which technology to use, and has high and low level programming knowledge

UX guru: The UX guru has visual design experience. They are profecient with working with different media formats. They have empathy for their users and are good at researching industry trends
